title: BACON, EGG, AND CHEESE CUPS
directions: Pre-heat oven to 350. Spray 6 of the 12 muffin cups of a muffin pan with cooking oil. Whisk eggs together and add desired salt and pepper. Drop bacon into 6 muffin cups. Drop cheese into cups. Spoon super whisked eggs into the muffin cups.
ingredients: 4 slices of bacon, cooked how you like
1/4 cup your choice of shredded cheese
